author: Staff Reporter
text: Communist Party of India leader D. Pandian had his books released here in the presence of literary persons on Friday. He had authored ‘Kambanin Arasiyal Kootani’, ‘Tiruvalluvarin Arasiyal Porulatharam’ and ‘Marxia Sindhanai Surukkam’. The book release was held at the PSG College of Technology.
title: Books released
